messages.subject: Re: America West
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/5/02 11:25:33 AM Pacific Standard Time, ... Interesting to read this, as I just returned from a trip to MN to be with my parents - my Dad
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/5/02 11:25:33 AM Pacific Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> refuse to fly America West ever
> again. They royally screwed us over about a year and a half ago, when I
> was flying to Tucson to be with my mom during her first chemo and
> radiation bout, and Rain and I ended up getting into Sky Harbor at
> midnight, missing all the connecting flights to Tucson, and then they
>
Interesting to read this, as I just returned from a trip to MN to be with my
parents - my Dad is now at home with hospice for his cancer.

We flew from San Diego to Phoenix - where we were supposed to have less than
an hour to wait for the flight to Minneapolis.

We ended up being there over 5 hours --

They didn't give us a free ticket (which would be so useful as I am planning
to return to MN next month), but instead $50 off the next ticket. I'm flying
with someone else in Dec.

Connie



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
